casebody.data:
Howard N. Bailey, Respondent v. John Claflin, et al., Appellants. Decided January 5, 1891. Appeal from judgment entered on report of referee. S. F. Kneeland and David Leventritt, for appellant. Abram Kling, for respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Freedman and Ingraham, JJ.

Per Curiam.

Judgment appealed from should be affirmed, with costs, on the opinion in Eckhard v. Epstein, 58 N. Y. Super. Ct. 288.
